title: 181: How Did We Survive Before Cell Phones? | Ear Biscuits Ep. 181
description:
From keeping you company on the crapper to being the third wheel on date nights, it seems like people are unable to go anywhere without their phones nowadays. On this nostalgia episode of Ear Biscuits, R&L reminisce on what it was like before the age of the cell phone.
